SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package application

Class Application_D1

Object
Application_D1
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Application_D1 extends Object implements Runnable
Runnable application class for the se1.bestellsystem.

In task C3, customers are created and printed using the Customer class from the datamodel.

Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-F12-Refactoring"
Author:
"sgraupner"

      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      collection - collection to look up the object
      matcher - function to define lambda expression returning a matching result

      Optional with first matching object or empty Optional

    • calculateOrderValue

      public long calculateOrderValue(Order order)
      Calculate value of an order, which is comprised of the value of each ordered item. The value of each item is calculated with calculateOrderItemValue(item).
      Parameters:
      order - to calculate value for.
      Returns:
      value of order.

    • calculateOrderItemValue

      public long calculateOrderItemValue(OrderItem item)
      Calculate value of an order item, which is calculated by: article.unitPrice * number of units ordered.
      Parameters:
      item - to calculate value for.
      Returns:
      value of item.

    • calculateOrderVAT

      public long calculateOrderVAT(Order order)
      Calculate VAT of an order, which is comprised of the VAT of each ordered item. The VAT of each item is calculated with calculateOrderItemVAT(item).
      Parameters:
      order - to calculate VAT tax for.
      Returns:
      VAT calculated for order.

    • calculateOrderItemVAT

      public long calculateOrderItemVAT(OrderItem item)
      Calculate the included VAT of an order item calculated by the applicable tax rate and the calculated order item value.
      Parameters:
      item - to calculate VAT for.
      Returns:
      VAT for ordered item.

    • calculateVAT

      public long calculateVAT(long grossValue, TAX tax)
      Calculate included VAT (Value-Added Tax) from a gross price/value based on a tax rate (VAT is called "Mehrwertsteuer" (MwSt.) in Germany).
      Parameters:
      grossValue - value that includes the tax.
      tax - applicable tax rate in percent.
      Returns:
      tax included in gross value.

    • fmtPrice

      public String fmtPrice(long price, int... fmt)
      Format long value to price according to a format (0 is default): 
       Example: long value: 499
 fmt:   0: "4.99"
        1: "4.99 EUR"
        2: "4.99EUR"
        3: "4.99€"
        4: "4.99$"
        5: "4.99£"
        6:  "499¥"
        7:  "499"
      Parameters:
      price - long value as price.
      fmt - price formatting style.
      Returns:
      formatted price according to style.

    • fmtDecimal

      public String fmtDecimal(long value, int decimalDigits, String... unit)
      Format long value to a decimal String with a specified number of digits.
      Parameters:
      value - value to format to String in decimal format.
      decimalDigits - number of digits.
      unit - appended unit as String.
      Returns:
      formatted decimal value as String.

    • fmtCustomerName

      public String fmtCustomerName(Customer customer, int... fmt)
      Format Customer name according to a format (0 is default): 
       fmt: 0: "Meyer, Eric"  10: "MEYER, ERIC"
      1: "Eric Meyer"   11: "ERIC MEYER"
      2: "Meyer, E."    12: "MEYER, E."
      3: "E. Meyer"     13: "E. MEYER"
      4: "Meyer"        14: "MEYER"
      5: "Eric"         15: "ERIC"
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object.
      fmt - name formatting style.
      Returns:
      formatted Customer name.

    • fmtCustomerContacts

      public String fmtCustomerContacts(Customer customer, int... fmt)
      Format Customer contacts according to a format (0 is default): 
       fmt: 0: first contact: "anne24@yahoo.de"
      1: first contact with extension indicator: "anne24@yahoo.de, (+2 contacts)"
      2: all contacts as list: "anne24@yahoo.de, (030) 3481-23352, fax: (030)23451356"
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object.
      fmt - name formatting style.
      Returns:
      formatted Customer contact information.
